View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.sqlserver;
2   
3   import com.test.AbstractTestSuite;
4   
5   public abstract class ConcreteSqlServerSuiteIT extends AbstractTestSuite {
6   
7       public ConcreteSqlServerSuiteIT() {
8           
9           this.jdbcURL = "jdbc:sqlserver://jsql-sqlserver:1433;trustServerCertificate=true";
10          this.jdbcUser = "sa";
11          this.jdbcPass = "yourStrong(!)Password";
12          this.jsqlDatabaseName = "master";
13          this.jsqlTableName = "student";
14          this.jsqlColumnName = "Student_Id";
15          
16          this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName = "name";
17          this.jdbcColumnForTableName = "name";
18          this.jdbcColumnForColumnName = "name";
19          
20          this.jdbcQueryForDatabaseNames = "select name from "+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"..sysdatabases";
21          this.jdbcQueryForTableNames = "select name from "+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"..sysobjects WHERE xtype='U'";
22          this.jdbcQueryForColumnNames = "select c.name FROM "+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"..syscolumns c, "+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"..sysobjects t WHERE c.id=t.id AND t.name='"+ this.jsqlTableName +"'";
23          this.jdbcQueryForValues = "select LTRIM(RTRIM("+ this.jsqlColumnName +")) "+ this.jsqlColumnName +" FROM "+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +".dbo."+ this.jsqlTableName;
24      }
25  }
